archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.4.3d: d) changes should be tested (e.g. in a test environment) to ensure vulnerabilities have not been introduced and help determine the expected results (e.g. the results of deploying a patch into the live environment)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
